name: Deathray
description:
Laser construction puzzle sim inspired by real-world laser physics.

Build a big shooty laser to process a variety of different materials. Earn money for each completed challenge to spend on the next laser.

  • Enormous flashlamp pumps!
  • Cryo cooling!
  • Beam combination!
  • Q-switches!

Can you blow up all the stuff?

This project is not quite finished (no sound, some placeholder graphics) but it is fully playable.
